name: Mike Dengerink
review: We had a great worship service. The sermon was from the book of Ephesians about how the church is to included all kinds of people.  Then for Sunday school we continued our series on relationships and marriage- challenging!

name: william gray
review: I love this church.I have been to this church before on several occations when living in the area and all I can say is that this church is awesome,pastor mike is one of the nicest people you would ever meet,the church is filled with God's presence and members are so nice.I truly love this church and it is highly recommended.

name: Deb Waterman
review: The most welcoming church I have ever found. Pastor Mike has a true heart for the Lord!
